channel.title: CVE Feed for El tiempo -- Weather Widget Pro

item.title: CVE-2024-35755|2024-08-02T03:14:54.021Z -- el%20tiempo -- weather%20widget%20pro
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in El tiempo Weather Widget Pro allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Weather Widget Pro: from n/a through 1.1.40.
